devdoc.details: The governance token for Archer DAO ERC-20 with supply controls + add-ons to allow for offchain signing See EIP-712, EIP-2612, and EIP-3009 for details

params.account: The address of the account holding the funds
params.spender: The address of the account spending the funds

approve(address,uint256).details: This will overwrite the approval amount for `spender`  and is subject to issues noted [here](https://eips.ethereum.org/EIPS/eip-20#approve)

params.amount: The number of tokens that are approved (2^256-1 means infinite)
params.spender: The address of the account which may transfer tokens

returns._0: Whether or not the approval succeeded

params.account: The address of the account to get the balance of

params.amount: The number of tokens to be burned
params.src: The account that will burn tokens

params._firstSupplyChangeAllowed: The timestamp after which the first supply change may occur
params._metadataManager: The account with the ability to change token metadata

params.amount: The number of tokens to be minted
params.dst: The address of the destination account

params.deadline: The time at which to expire the signature
params.r: Half of the ECDSA signature pair
params.s: Half of the ECDSA signature pair
params.v: The recovery byte of the signature
params.value: The number of tokens that are approved (2^256-1 means infinite)

params.newMetadataManager: The address of the new metadata manager

params.newCap: The new mint cap in bips (10,000 bips = 1% of totalSupply)

params.period: The new supply change waiting period

params.newSupplyManager: The address of the new supply manager

params.amount: The number of tokens to transfer
params.dst: The address of the destination account

returns._0: Whether or not the transfer succeeded

params.amount: The number of tokens to transfer
params.dst: The address of the destination account
params.src: The address of the source account

returns._0: Whether or not the transfer succeeded

params.r: Half of the ECDSA signature pair
params.s: Half of the ECDSA signature pair
params.v: The recovery byte of the signature
params.validAfter: The time after which this is valid (unix time)
params.validBefore: The time before which this is valid (unix time)

params.tokenName: The new name for the token
params.tokenSymbol: The new symbol for the token

allowances.details: Allowance amounts on behalf of others

authorizationState.details: authorizer address > nonce > state (true = used / false = unused)

balances.details: Official record of token balances for each account

devdoc.title: ArchToken

AuthorizationUsed(address,bytes32).notice: An event that's emitted whenever an authorized transfer occurs

MetadataManagerChanged(address,address).notice: An event that's emitted when the metadataManager address is changed

MintCapChanged(uint16,uint16).notice: An event that's emitted when the mintCap is changed

SupplyChangeWaitingPeriodChanged(uint32,.notice: An event that's emitted when the supplyChangeWaitingPeriod is changed

SupplyManagerChanged(address,address).notice: An event that's emitted when the supplyManager address is changed

TokenMetaUpdated(string,string).notice: An event that's emitted when the token name and symbol are changed

DOMAIN_TYPEHASH().notice: The EIP-712 typehash for the contract's domain keccak256("EIP712Domain(string name,string version,uint256 chainId,address verifyingContract)")

PERMIT_TYPEHASH().notice: The EIP-712 typehash for the permit struct used by the contract keccak256("Permit(address owner,address spender,uint256 value,uint256 nonce,uint256 deadline)");

TRANSFER_WITH_AUTHORIZATION_TYPEHASH().notice: The EIP-3009 typehash for transferWithAuthorization keccak256("TransferWithAuthorization(address from,address to,uint256 value,uint256 validAfter,uint256 validBefore,bytes32 nonce)");

allowance(address,address).notice: Get the number of tokens `spender` is approved to spend on behalf of `account`

approve(address,uint256).notice: Approve `spender` to transfer up to `amount` from `src`

balanceOf(address).notice: Get the number of tokens held by the `account`

decimals().notice: EIP-20 token decimals for this token

metadataManager().notice: Address which may change token metadata

mintCap().notice: Cap on the total amount that can be minted at each mint (measured in bips: 10,000 bips = 1% of current totalSupply)

name().notice: EIP-20 token name for this token

nonces(address).notice: A record of states for signing / validating signatures

permit(address,address,uint256,uint256,u.notice: Triggers an approval from owner to spender

setMintCap(uint16).notice: Set the maximum amount of tokens that can be minted at once

setSupplyChangeWaitingPeriod(uint32).notice: Set the minimum time between supply changes

supplyChangeAllowedAfter().notice: The timestamp after which a supply change may occur

supplyChangeWaitingPeriod().notice: The initial minimum time between changing the token supply

supplyChangeWaitingPeriodMinimum().notice: Hard cap on the minimum time between changing the token supply

symbol().notice: EIP-20 token symbol for this token

totalSupply().notice: Total number of tokens in circulation

transferWithAuthorization(address,addres.notice: Transfer tokens with a signed authorization

updateTokenMetadata(string,string).notice: Update the token name and symbol
